translations: v．怀恨，愤恨：对某人或某事表示不满或愤怒，通常是因为觉得受到不公平对待。
· She was resenting the fact that he had all the power.
她对他拥有所有的权力感到愤恨。

sentences.sentence: We end up resenting the great opportunities God brings into our lives.
sentences.translation: 我们最终对于上帝给我们生命中带来的机遇感到愤怒。

sentences.sentence: The public have been resenting the illicit road toll charging in recent years.
sentences.translation: 公路收费之乱近年来为公众所深恶痛绝。

sentences.sentence: Moderation - Avoid extremes; forbear resenting injuries so much as you think they deserve.
sentences.translation: 适度——不走极端；避免因怨恨而对别人进行你认为他们应得的伤害。
